title: Settings

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Theme, font size and language settings

defaultModel.title: Configure Models
defaultModel.description: Manage AI models and API keys

agentPrompts.title: Agent Prompts Collection
agentPrompts.description: Browse and use built-in rich prompt templates

aiDebate.title: AI Debate Settings
aiDebate.description: Configure AI mutual debate discussion feature

webSearch.title: Web Search
webSearch.description: Configure web search and related services

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base Settings
knowledge.description: Manage knowledge base configuration and embedding models

data.title: Data Settings
data.description: Manage data storage and privacy options

about.appDescription: A powerful AI assistant application supporting multiple large language models to help you work more efficiently.

scrollCacheError: Failed to clear scroll position cache

interaction.title: Interaction Behavior
interaction.description: Customize application interaction methods and notification settings

sendWithEnter.label: Send Message with Enter Key
sendWithEnter.description: Press Enter to quickly send messages, use Shift+Enter to add a new line

enableNotifications.label: Enable Notifications
enableNotifications.description: Show system notifications when AI assistant completes a reply

mobileInputMethodEnterAsNewline.label: Mobile Input Method Enter as Newline
mobileInputMethodEnterAsNewline.description: When enabled, the send button of the mobile input method will become a newline function, and you need to click the send button in the input box to send messages

hapticFeedback.title: Haptic Feedback
hapticFeedback.description: Customize haptic feedback settings for app interactions
hapticFeedback.disabledHint: Enable haptic feedback to configure more options

enabled.label: Enable Haptic Feedback
enabled.description: When enabled, app interactions will provide haptic feedback

enableOnSidebar.label: Haptics on Sidebar
enableOnSidebar.description: Enable haptic feedback when opening/closing sidebar

enableOnSwitch.label: Haptics on Switch
enableOnSwitch.description: Enable haptic feedback when toggling switches

enableOnListItem.label: Haptics on List Items
enableOnListItem.description: Enable haptic feedback when tapping list items

enableOnNavigation.label: Haptics on Navigation
enableOnNavigation.description: Enable haptic feedback when using navigation buttons

searchSection.title: Search Prompts
searchSection.description: Quickly find the templates you need in our rich prompt library

systemPromptVariables.title: System Prompt Variable Injection
systemPromptVariables.description: Automatically inject dynamic variables like time and location into system prompts
systemPromptVariables.infoMessage: When enabled, the system will automatically append corresponding variable information to the end of the system prompt when sending messages.

timeVariable.label: Time Variable
timeVariable.hint: Time information will be automatically appended to the end of the system prompt

locationVariable.label: Location Variable
locationVariable.placeholder: Enter custom location (e.g., Beijing, Chaoyang District)
locationVariable.hint: Location information will be automatically appended to the end of the system prompt
locationVariable.hintEmpty: Leave empty to use system-detected location

osVariable.label: Operating System Variable
osVariable.hint: OS information will be automatically appended to the end of the system prompt

quickPhraseManagement.title: Quick Phrases
quickPhraseManagement.description: Manage quick phrases for fast content insertion in chats.

displaySettings.title: Display Settings
displaySettings.showButtonDescription: Toggle quick phrase button in chat input

actions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this quick phrase?

notion.title: Notion Integration Settings
notion.description: Configure Notion integration to export conversations to your Notion database.

apiKey.label: Notion API Key
apiKey.helperText: Create an integration at https://www.notion.so/my-integrations and get your API key

databaseId.label: Database ID
databaseId.helperText: Extract the ID from your Notion database URL

pageTitleField.label: Page Title Field Name
pageTitleField.helperText: The field name used as the title in your database, usually 'Name' or '名称'

dateField.label: Date Field Name (Optional)
dateField.helperText: Enter the date field name if your database has one; leave empty to skip adding date info

testConnection.errorMissingFields: Please fill in both API key and database ID first
testConnection.errorTitleFieldNotFound: Title field "{{field}}" not found in database. Please check if the field name is correct

corsInfo.title: About CORS Issues:
corsInfo.webDev: Proxy is configured in web dev environment. Mobile apps use CORS bypass plugin.
corsInfo.production: If you encounter CORS errors in production, try:
corsInfo.suggestion1: Use the mobile app (auto bypasses CORS)
corsInfo.note: Note: Restart dev server for proxy changes to take effect.

setupSteps.title: Setup Steps:
setupSteps.step2: Copy the API key and paste it into the "Notion API Key" field above
setupSteps.step3: Create a database in Notion and connect your integration to it
setupSteps.step4: Copy the database ID from the URL and paste it into the "Database ID" field
setupSteps.step5: Confirm the title field name in your database (usually "Name" or "名称")
setupSteps.step6: (Optional) Enter the date field name if you want to add creation dates
setupSteps.step7: Click "Test Connection" to verify your configuration
